channel.title: Spiritual Journey Teachings
channel.description: Spiritual messages by Ted Nottingham based on indepth study of the Scriptures and leading guides of the spiritual life down through the centuries. These messages provide practical methods for applying wisdom in living one's daily life. The teachings are delivered from the sanctuary of Northwood Christian Church in Indianapolis, Indiana.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Indepth and practical messages
channel.itunes:author: Ted Nottingham
channel.itunes:summary: Spiritual messages by Ted Nottingham based on indepth study of the Scriptures and leading guides of the spiritual life down through the centuries. These messages provide practical methods for applying wisdom in living one's daily life. The teachings are delivered from the sanctuary of Northwood Christian Church in Indianapolis, Indiana.

item.title: To our Listeners
item.description: A special message to those who have appreciated and been fed by the teachings made available here. A call to a next step in your spiritual development.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: A special message to those who have appreciated and been fed by the teachings made available here. A call to a next step in your spiritual development.

item.title: Rebirth
item.description: The heart of the Teaching and the instructions from the Anointed One on how to breakthrough our ordinary human condition to encounter the Presence of the Living God and live in that spiritual awakening.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The heart of the Teaching and the instructions from the Anointed One on how to breakthrough our ordinary human condition to encounter the Presence of the Living God and live in that spiritual awakening.

item.title: THE VISION
item.description: The mystic vision of Peter which revealed the universal inclusion of Church (ecclesia -- the assembly of those who are called out) and its transcendence of traditions for the sake of authentic spiritual awakening, enabling experience of the living God.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The mystic vision of Peter which revealed the universal inclusion of Church (ecclesia -- the assembly of those who are called out) and its transcendence of traditions for the sake of authentic spiritual awakening, enabling experience of the living God.

item.title: Inner Teacher
item.description: The spiritual instructions of Jesus to all who seek for intimate connection with the Presence of the Divine, and the meaning and implications for every person found within the teaching on the "sending of the Holy Spirit," the indwelling Teacher who guides, enlightens, and protects those who are receptive to this universal Truth.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The spiritual instructions of Jesus to all who seek for intimate connection with the Presence of the Divine, and the meaning and implications for every person found within the teaching on the "sending of the Holy Spirit," the indwelling Teacher who guides, enlightens, and protects those who are receptive to this universal Truth.

item.title: Chosen
item.description: The heart of Christ's teachings on the nature and purpose of our existence, offering the methodologies and direction to awaken every person to encounter with the Divine and its transformational impact on our daily behavior and discovery of the sacred in daily circumstances.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The heart of Christ's teachings on the nature and purpose of our existence, offering the methodologies and direction to awaken every person to encounter with the Divine and its transformational impact on our daily behavior and discovery of the sacred in daily circumstances.

item.title: I AM
item.description: A pinnacle teaching of the Christ, expressing a universal Truth at the heart of everyone's being and identity. Beyond the simple metaphors lies the highest expression of each person's potential connection to the Presence of the Holy One, the source of life at the heart of the universe. This foundational teaching is the secret to conscious existence and to a deeper Self, beyond the ups and downs, the illusions and pain of daily life.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: A pinnacle teaching of the Christ, expressing a universal Truth at the heart of everyone's being and identity. Beyond the simple metaphors lies the highest expression of each person's potential connection to the Presence of the Holy One, the source of life at the heart of the universe. This foundational teaching is the secret to conscious existence and to a deeper Self, beyond the ups and downs, the illusions and pain of daily life.

item.title: The Shepherd
item.description: The profound psychological and spiritual meaning embedded in the metaphors of sheep, shepherd, and wolves in the foundational teaching of Christ found in John 10.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The profound psychological and spiritual meaning embedded in the metaphors of sheep, shepherd, and wolves in the foundational teaching of Christ found in John 10.

item.title: The Resurrected One
item.description: The climactic resurrection teaching from the Gospel of John, filled with timeless spiritual wisdom, mystical and metaphysical symbolism, and revealing the process by which seekers of God find their way into the Presence, as well as the ultimate purpose of the ecclesia (the assembly of those who are called out).
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The climactic resurrection teaching from the Gospel of John, filled with timeless spiritual wisdom, mystical and metaphysical symbolism, and revealing the process by which seekers of God find their way into the Presence, as well as the ultimate purpose of the ecclesia (the assembly of those who are called out).

item.title: Risen!
item.description: Understanding the implications of the testimonials and dramatic changes that took place as a result of the resurrection of Christ and the transformation it can make upon our lives today.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Understanding the implications of the testimonials and dramatic changes that took place as a result of the resurrection of Christ and the transformation it can make upon our lives today.

item.title: The Prophecy
item.description: The multiple meanings found in the prophetic fulfillment incarnated in the entrance of Jesus into Jerusalem, including personal implications on letting Spirit into our lives.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The multiple meanings found in the prophetic fulfillment incarnated in the entrance of Jesus into Jerusalem, including personal implications on letting Spirit into our lives.

item.title: Pressing On
item.description: The foundational teaching from the Apostle Paul on what it means to live as a follower of Christ, both in our individual lives and as a spiritual community.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The foundational teaching from the Apostle Paul on what it means to live as a follower of Christ, both in our individual lives and as a spiritual community.

item.title: Eternal Life
item.description: Understanding the deeper significance behind the spiritual metaphors and familiar words of John 3:16-21 and their immediate impact on our daily behavior and way of living in the world.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Understanding the deeper significance behind the spiritual metaphors and familiar words of John 3:16-21 and their immediate impact on our daily behavior and way of living in the world.

item.title: Zeal
item.description: The inner meaning of the prophetic expressions manifested by the Christ in the shocking cleansing of the Temple and their impact on religion and on individual human lives.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The inner meaning of the prophetic expressions manifested by the Christ in the shocking cleansing of the Temple and their impact on religion and on individual human lives.

item.title: Sacrifice
item.description: Understanding the cornerstone teachings of the Christ given as practical instructions to all who would truly enter the way of being that He offers and reveals as our true purpose.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Understanding the cornerstone teachings of the Christ given as practical instructions to all who would truly enter the way of being that He offers and reveals as our true purpose.

item.title: Confrontation
item.description: The deeper meaning of Christ's struggle with temptation and "Diabolos" in the wilderness. A classic spiritual metaphor offering timeless instruction for finding our way out of our emotional and spiritual barrenness.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The deeper meaning of Christ's struggle with temptation and "Diabolos" in the wilderness. A classic spiritual metaphor offering timeless instruction for finding our way out of our emotional and spiritual barrenness.

item.title: Uncreated Light
item.description: The multi-layered symbolism within the teaching on the Transfiguration and the universal meaning of the mystical phenomenon revealing the ultimate identity of the Anointed One.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The multi-layered symbolism within the teaching on the Transfiguration and the universal meaning of the mystical phenomenon revealing the ultimate identity of the Anointed One.

item.title: The Prize
item.description: The practical teachings and spiritual methodologies hidden in the metaphors of the runner, the race, the training, the prize presented by Paul in Corinthians. A classic example of holy wisdom passed down through time in familiar images pointing to personal, transformation revelation.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The practical teachings and spiritual methodologies hidden in the metaphors of the runner, the race, the training, the prize presented by Paul in Corinthians. A classic example of holy wisdom passed down through time in familiar images pointing to personal, transformation revelation.

item.title: Miracle
item.description: The profoundly symbolic and surprisingly personal teachings found in the Miracle at Cana, the first of the "signs" of Jesus in the Gospel of John. Beyond the images and narrative is found a cornerstone expression of what the Anointed One makes available to every person seeking encounter with the Holy.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The profoundly symbolic and surprisingly personal teachings found in the Miracle at Cana, the first of the "signs" of Jesus in the Gospel of John. Beyond the images and narrative is found a cornerstone expression of what the Anointed One makes available to every person seeking encounter with the Holy.

item.title: The Anointed One
item.description: The critical meaning of Jesus revealing at Nazareth the purpose and meaning of his incarnation as the Messiah, the Anointed One, and his teaching for every human being.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The critical meaning of Jesus revealing at Nazareth the purpose and meaning of his incarnation as the Messiah, the Anointed One, and his teaching for every human being.

item.title: Illumination
item.description: The extraordinary unveiling of the "plan of the Mystery of God" and its transforming meaning for our lives as expressed by the Apostle Paul in the Letter to the Ephesians, along with the foundational and timeless role of the Church and its ultimate purpose as made known at its origins.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The extraordinary unveiling of the "plan of the Mystery of God" and its transforming meaning for our lives as expressed by the Apostle Paul in the Letter to the Ephesians, along with the foundational and timeless role of the Church and its ultimate purpose as made known at its origins.

item.title: Revealed
item.description: The deeply personal meaning for every person beyond the symbolism and purpose of the Baptism of Jesus and the epiphany which followed that event. Embedded in these images and this narrative is a methodology for experiencing the intimacy of the Presence of the Holy.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The deeply personal meaning for every person beyond the symbolism and purpose of the Baptism of Jesus and the epiphany which followed that event. Embedded in these images and this narrative is a methodology for experiencing the intimacy of the Presence of the Holy.

item.title: A New Book for 2012
item.description: Reflections on and an introduction to the just published book "Yeshua the Cosmic Mystic: Beyond Religion to Universal Truth" authored by Ted Nottingham. The book is available on Amazon and Kindle: http://www.amazon.com/Yeshua-Cosmic-Mystic-religion-Universal/dp/0983769737/ref=sr_1_1_title_0_main?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1325787988&sr=1-1
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Reflections on and an introduction to the just published book "Yeshua the Cosmic Mystic: Beyond Religion to Universal Truth" authored by Ted Nottingham. The book is available on Amazon and Kindle: http://www.amazon.com/Yeshua-Cosmic-Mystic-religion-Universal/dp/0983769737/ref=sr_1_1_title_0_main?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1325787988&sr=1-1

item.title: Consolation
item.description: The inner teaching embedded in the ritual of the infant Christ brought to the temple and the prophetic vision of the holy Simeon related to our times and especially to this new year. The message is followed by music from a quartet composed of members from the Choir of Northwood Christian Church.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The inner teaching embedded in the ritual of the infant Christ brought to the temple and the prophetic vision of the holy Simeon related to our times and especially to this new year. The message is followed by music from a quartet composed of members from the Choir of Northwood Christian Church.

item.title: New Year Message
item.description: Reflections for the New Year.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Reflections for the New Year.

item.title: Christmas Day Message
item.description: A Christmas Day Message from Pastor Ted Nottingham and Northwood Christian Church for those who have ears to hear.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: A Christmas Day Message from Pastor Ted Nottingham and Northwood Christian Church for those who have ears to hear.

item.title: Christmas Eve Message 2011
item.description: A Christmas Eve message by Pastor Ted Nottingham at Northwood Christian Church, followed by a special rendition of "O Holy Night".
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: A Christmas Eve message by Pastor Ted Nottingham at Northwood Christian Church, followed by a special rendition of "O Holy Night".

item.title: Mary
item.description: The powerful teaching behind the story of Mary and her example of humility and surrender to the Holy, which is the template for every spiritual seeker who hungers for the birth of Christ within and relationship to the Creator.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The powerful teaching behind the story of Mary and her example of humility and surrender to the Holy, which is the template for every spiritual seeker who hungers for the birth of Christ within and relationship to the Creator.

item.title: Prepare
item.description: The spiritual instructions embedded in the teaching of the Messenger calling out in the wilderness of the human soul. A teaching on making psychological and spiritual "room" for connection with Spirit.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The spiritual instructions embedded in the teaching of the Messenger calling out in the wilderness of the human soul. A teaching on making psychological and spiritual "room" for connection with Spirit.

item.title: He is Near
item.description: The multi-dimensional teachings in the prophetic and apocalyptic words of the Christ spoken as he overlooked the Temple in Jerusalem, and their personal implications for our experience of God in every moment of our lives.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The multi-dimensional teachings in the prophetic and apocalyptic words of the Christ spoken as he overlooked the Temple in Jerusalem, and their personal implications for our experience of God in every moment of our lives.

item.title: Be Thankful
item.description: Discovering the true spiritual discipline of gratitude as a foundation for remembrance and experience of the Presence of God as taught through the methodologies of the Apostle Paul in the Letter to the Colossians.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Discovering the true spiritual discipline of gratitude as a foundation for remembrance and experience of the Presence of God as taught through the methodologies of the Apostle Paul in the Letter to the Colossians.

item.title: The Living Way
item.description: A powerful teaching from the Letter to the Hebrews on the breakthrough toward intimate contact with the Divine made possible by the Anointed One. A radical decoding of ancient metaphors is necessary to find the meaning for today.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: A powerful teaching from the Letter to the Hebrews on the breakthrough toward intimate contact with the Divine made possible by the Anointed One. A radical decoding of ancient metaphors is necessary to find the meaning for today.

item.title: Inner Light
item.description: The specific and transformational instructions embedded in the parable of the ten bridesmaids and their impact on every human life seeking to experience the Presence of God.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The specific and transformational instructions embedded in the parable of the ten bridesmaids and their impact on every human life seeking to experience the Presence of God.

item.title: Spiritual Renewal
item.description: The practical teachings contained in parable form depicting the steps toward spiritual awakening as found in the metaphors of the mixing of wheat and tares, the mustard seed, and the yeast and dough. This is timeless wisdom for the evolution of human consciousness.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The practical teachings contained in parable form depicting the steps toward spiritual awakening as found in the metaphors of the mixing of wheat and tares, the mustard seed, and the yeast and dough. This is timeless wisdom for the evolution of human consciousness.

item.title: A New Creation
item.description: The climactic teaching of Jesus expressed in the parable of the grain of wheat and its powerful directive as a methodology for authentic spiritual development.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The climactic teaching of Jesus expressed in the parable of the grain of wheat and its powerful directive as a methodology for authentic spiritual development.

item.title: Being Found
item.description: The exceptional and transformational parable of the lost sheep, its implications for every person and its revelation of the nature of the Uncreated One.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The exceptional and transformational parable of the lost sheep, its implications for every person and its revelation of the nature of the Uncreated One.

item.title: Unity
item.description: The final and ultimate prayer offered by Jesus that "they may all be one" identifying this call to all spiritually-minded people as the fundamental purpose of His mission and the very essence of what it means to be a Christian and a faith community.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The final and ultimate prayer offered by Jesus that "they may all be one" identifying this call to all spiritually-minded people as the fundamental purpose of His mission and the very essence of what it means to be a Christian and a faith community.

item.title: Humility
item.description: A key practical teaching leading to authentic personal and communal alignment with the Way of living made known and called for by Christ.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: A key practical teaching leading to authentic personal and communal alignment with the Way of living made known and called for by Christ.

item.title: Letting Go
item.description: Understanding the personal implications of the Parable of the Laborers in the Vineyard and the revelation of Grace manifested even at the eleventh hour for every individual.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Understanding the personal implications of the Parable of the Laborers in the Vineyard and the revelation of Grace manifested even at the eleventh hour for every individual.

item.title: Forgiveness
item.description: The powerful and demanding wisdom teaching expressed through the parable of the unmerciful servant and given as an urgent teaching from the Christ to all who seek to live in the light.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The powerful and demanding wisdom teaching expressed through the parable of the unmerciful servant and given as an urgent teaching from the Christ to all who seek to live in the light.

item.title: Waking Up
item.description: The practical instructions found withing the first century language and metaphors used by Paul in Romans 13 which reveal timeless, universal wisdom for daily life.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The practical instructions found withing the first century language and metaphors used by Paul in Romans 13 which reveal timeless, universal wisdom for daily life.

item.title: Joy
item.description: The life-changing teaching found in the call to rejoice always and be grateful in all circumstances. The application of this wisdom is possible for every person and leads to our true purpose and destiny.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The life-changing teaching found in the call to rejoice always and be grateful in all circumstances. The application of this wisdom is possible for every person and leads to our true purpose and destiny.

item.title: Who is He?
item.description: The turning point for every human life in response to Christ's question "Who do you say that I am?" and the implications of our response for our daily living.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The turning point for every human life in response to Christ's question "Who do you say that I am?" and the implications of our response for our daily living.

item.title: From the Heart
item.description: The radical teaching from Jesus regarding the very nature of religion, transforming it from an external set of obligations to an internal awakening to our spiritual nature.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The radical teaching from Jesus regarding the very nature of religion, transforming it from an external set of obligations to an internal awakening to our spiritual nature.

item.title: Storms
item.description: The specific instructions for spiritual help available to all embedded in the images and symbolism of Jesus walking on water in the storm.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The specific instructions for spiritual help available to all embedded in the images and symbolism of Jesus walking on water in the storm.

item.title: Miracle
item.description: The powerful revelation of the Presence and Grace of God available to everyone contained within the miracle of the loaves and fishes
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The powerful revelation of the Presence and Grace of God available to everyone contained within the miracle of the loaves and fishes

item.title: The Love of God
item.description: The powerful meaning behind the words of Romans 8:26-39 and the ways by which we can access their promise of guidance, courage, protection, and unity.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The powerful meaning behind the words of Romans 8:26-39 and the ways by which we can access their promise of guidance, courage, protection, and unity.

item.title: What is the Kingdom of Heaven?
item.description: Defining the inner meaning of that foundational teaching of Christ expressed through the parables as instructions for living in the Presence of God.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Defining the inner meaning of that foundational teaching of Christ expressed through the parables as instructions for living in the Presence of God.

item.title: Spiritual Soil
item.description: The profound and transforming teaching found at the heart of the Parable of Parables and the keys it provides for understanding other parables of Christ.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The profound and transforming teaching found at the heart of the Parable of Parables and the keys it provides for understanding other parables of Christ.

item.title: Rest for your Soul
item.description: The cosmic invitation by the Christ to everyone who yearns for connection with the mystery and wonder of the Divine at the heart of life.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The cosmic invitation by the Christ to everyone who yearns for connection with the mystery and wonder of the Divine at the heart of life.

item.title: Friends of God
item.description: The transformational meaning of Christ's climactic words on becoming friends rather than slaves of the Holy.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The transformational meaning of Christ's climactic words on becoming friends rather than slaves of the Holy.

item.title: Fear Not
item.description: The practical and psychological teaching from the Christ on living the spiritual life in a world that rejects it.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The practical and psychological teaching from the Christ on living the spiritual life in a world that rejects it.

item.title: Power of God
item.description: The personal meaning of the Pentecost experience and the true nature of what "church" is meant to be.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The personal meaning of the Pentecost experience and the true nature of what "church" is meant to be.

item.title: The Rock
item.description: The powerful and foundational teaching from the Christ on the critical necessity of applying His teachings to our daily lives in order to make connection with the Presence of God.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The powerful and foundational teaching from the Christ on the critical necessity of applying His teachings to our daily lives in order to make connection with the Presence of God.

item.title: Mind of the Spirit
item.description: Breaking through the coded teachings on "mind of flesh" and "mind of spirit" in the context of making connection in practical ways with the Presence of God.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Breaking through the coded teachings on "mind of flesh" and "mind of spirit" in the context of making connection in practical ways with the Presence of God.

item.title: The Way
item.description: The meaning and practices of the final teachings of Christ on being the Way and on the sending of the Spirit.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The meaning and practices of the final teachings of Christ on being the Way and on the sending of the Spirit.

item.title: Abundant Life
item.description: The powerful and transforming teaching behind the metaphors of sheep, shepherd, and wolves.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The powerful and transforming teaching behind the metaphors of sheep, shepherd, and wolves.

item.title: Boldness
item.description: The exceptional teaching from the first letter of John on enabling Divine Life to work through us.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The exceptional teaching from the first letter of John on enabling Divine Life to work through us.

item.title: Resurrection
item.description: The meaning and implications of the empty tomb.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The meaning and implications of the empty tomb.

item.title: Hosanna!
item.description: Discovering the symbolic teaching in the story of the entrance into Jerusalem and its implication for every person's daily life.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Discovering the symbolic teaching in the story of the entrance into Jerusalem and its implication for every person's daily life.

item.title: Cleansing
item.description: The teaching on personal transformation and the true purpose of religion contained in the story of Christ's cleansing of the temple.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The teaching on personal transformation and the true purpose of religion contained in the story of Christ's cleansing of the temple.

item.title: Water of Life
item.description: The multi-layered teachings found in the story of the Samaritan woman encountering Jesus at the well.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The multi-layered teachings found in the story of the Samaritan woman encountering Jesus at the well.

item.title: Born from Above
item.description: The essence of Christ's teachings and the pathway to authentic spiritual awakening to the Presence of God.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The essence of Christ's teachings and the pathway to authentic spiritual awakening to the Presence of God.

item.title: Wilderness
item.description: The practical teaching made available through the encoded wisdom in the story of Christ in wilderness.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The practical teaching made available through the encoded wisdom in the story of Christ in wilderness.

item.title: Uncreated Light
item.description: The personal meaning of the Transfiguration and the potential for its immediate impact on our daily lives.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The personal meaning of the Transfiguration and the potential for its immediate impact on our daily lives.

item.title: Anxiety Free
item.description: The practical application and potential for authentic spiritual awakening and new perspective on life offered by the parable of the lilies.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The practical application and potential for authentic spiritual awakening and new perspective on life offered by the parable of the lilies.

item.title: Indwelling Spirit
item.description: The practical application of the teaching on being "temples of the Holy Spirit" and its impact on daily life.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The practical application of the teaching on being "temples of the Holy Spirit" and its impact on daily life.

item.title: Mystic Vision
item.description: The spiritual experience of Isaiah and its implications for every person who yearns for encounter with the Holy.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The spiritual experience of Isaiah and its implications for every person who yearns for encounter with the Holy.

item.title: Agape
item.description: Living out the core of Christ's teaching -- conscious love.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Living out the core of Christ's teaching -- conscious love.

item.title: Happiness
item.description: Discovering the specific instructions for a God-conscious life embedded in the Beatitudes, the heart of the teachings of Christ.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Discovering the specific instructions for a God-conscious life embedded in the Beatitudes, the heart of the teachings of Christ.

item.title: Freedom
item.description: Discovering the individual spiritual liberation and healing at the heart of the mission of Christ.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Discovering the individual spiritual liberation and healing at the heart of the mission of Christ.

item.title: Follow Me
item.description: The spiritual meaning of "following" the Anointed One and the universal teachings embedded in the calling of the disciples.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The spiritual meaning of "following" the Anointed One and the universal teachings embedded in the calling of the disciples.

item.title: The Beloved
item.description: Discovering the methodology for encountering Spirit made known in the story and image of Christ's baptism.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Discovering the methodology for encountering Spirit made known in the story and image of Christ's baptism.

item.title: The Word
item.description: The implication of the great cosmic prologue to the Gospel of John and the new beginning of another year, along with a practical process for sustaining spiritual resolutions.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The implication of the great cosmic prologue to the Gospel of John and the new beginning of another year, along with a practical process for sustaining spiritual resolutions.

item.title: Spiritual Strength
item.description: The instructions from Paul on connecting with divine power and developing the maturity to give thanks in all circumstances.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The instructions from Paul on connecting with divine power and developing the maturity to give thanks in all circumstances.

item.title: Endurance
item.description: The deeper, more personal meaning of Christ's foretelling of the Temple's destruction and the decoding of apocalyptic words which unveil their spiritual wisdom.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The deeper, more personal meaning of Christ's foretelling of the Temple's destruction and the decoding of apocalyptic words which unveil their spiritual wisdom.

item.title: The Heart of the Teaching
item.description: The core of Christ's teaching and revelation as a pathway to experience of the Holy in everyday life.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The core of Christ's teaching and revelation as a pathway to experience of the Holy in everyday life.

item.title: Seeking the Lost
item.description: The revelation of acceptance and the path to new life made known in the story of Zaccheus, which is also each person's story.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The revelation of acceptance and the path to new life made known in the story of Zaccheus, which is also each person's story.

item.title: The New Covenant
item.description: The gift of personal renewal made known through the prophecy of the New Covenant announced by Jeremiah.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The gift of personal renewal made known through the prophecy of the New Covenant announced by Jeremiah.

item.title: What Must We Do?
item.description: The core teaching for every seeker of God at the heart of the parable of the rich young man and his question to the Christ.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The core teaching for every seeker of God at the heart of the parable of the rich young man and his question to the Christ.

item.title: Faith
item.description: The strange cry from the disciples for Christ to "increase our faith" and the discovery of what true faith might be.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The strange cry from the disciples for Christ to "increase our faith" and the discovery of what true faith might be.

item.title: The Light
item.description: The meaning of becoming salt and light in a world of darkness and persecution.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The meaning of becoming salt and light in a world of darkness and persecution.

item.title: Stumbling
item.description: The harsh sayings of Jesus providing a methodology for advancing on the spiritual path.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The harsh sayings of Jesus providing a methodology for advancing on the spiritual path.

item.title: Repentance
item.description: The exceptional teaching at the heart the parable of the lost lamb.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The exceptional teaching at the heart the parable of the lost lamb.

item.title: The Cost
item.description: Defining the spiritual "price" to pay or the transformative process necessary to become a follower of the Christ.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Defining the spiritual "price" to pay or the transformative process necessary to become a follower of the Christ.

item.title: Consecrated
item.description: Jeremiah 1:4-10. The teaching of God's unconditional love for each person prior to birth and the call on every life to live consciously in God's Presence.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: Jeremiah 1:4-10. The teaching of God's unconditional love for each person prior to birth and the call on every life to live consciously in God's Presence.

item.title: Set Free
item.description: The radical teaching on breaking traditions and rules for a great Good, challenging individuals and religions to overcome rigid attitudes.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: The radical teaching on breaking traditions and rules for a great Good, challenging individuals and religions to overcome rigid attitudes.

item.title: The Path of Initiation
item.description: An introduction to the teachings of Karlfried Graf Durckheim, spiritual teacher and transpersonal psychologist. Combining the insights of Zen Buddhism and the Christian mystics, Durckheim's wisdom transcends tradition and leads the student into authentic personal transformation, the encounter with deeper Reality and with our True Self.
item.dc:creator: Ted Nottingham
item.itunes:summary: An introduction to the teachings of Karlfried Graf Durckheim, spiritual teacher and transpersonal psychologist. Combining the insights of Zen Buddhism and the Christian mystics, Durckheim's wisdom transcends tradition and leads the student into authentic personal transformation, the encounter with deeper Reality and with our True Self.
